Text: FW Center for Houstons Future lost mailKen no response or action required just a dumb transition mistake at my end My apologies to the board members of the Center for Houstons Future Best Vidal Original Message From Vidal G Martinez mailto Sent Friday September AM To Eugene H Vaughn Jim C Kollaer Subject Center for Houstons Future lost mail Gene and Jim incredibly and just today I received from my previous law firms home office in New York your letter dated January inviting me to be one of the participants in the Center for Houstons Future When my previous firm closed its Houston offices at the end of last December all mail was collected and forwarded to New York for sorting and redistribution The mail from January that should have been sent to me was apparently sitting in a corner all these months in the New York mail room of Curtis Mallet my previous firm and was delivered to me yesterday including your letter You can imagine what my reaction was to my previous firms management concerning this nine month delay I am most distressed however to have missed the opportunity to participate in the Center for Houstons Futures endeavors which I most certainly would have and am somewhat surprised that my failure to respond to such an important effort never came up in conversation among us weve been around each other innumerable times since the letter was sent My apologies to the both of you and to the Board of Directors of the Center I care deeply about this city and region and would have felt privileged to have participated My best to the both of you Vidal Vidal G Martinez Louisiana rd Floor Houston Texas Email Direct Tel Fax Cellular
